title: Galactic Artistry.
content: Galactic Artistry is a website dedicated to showcasing the beauty of abstract art inspired by the cosmos. Our collection features a variety of stunning images that capture the essence of galaxies, nebulas, and other celestial bodies. Each piece is carefully crafted to evoke a sense of wonder and awe, using bold colors and intricate patterns to create a truly immersive experience. Whether you're a fan of science fiction or simply appreciate the beauty of the universe, Galactic Artistry has something for everyone. Browse our collection today and discover the magic of cosmic art! ðŸš€âœ¨

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a spiral galaxy, with bright colors and swirling patterns that evoke a sense of movement and depth."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
